newsitem.title: UK: IPE NATURAL GAS DRIFTS IN MIXED DIRECTIONS.
newsitem.headline: IPE NATURAL GAS DRIFTS IN MIXED DIRECTIONS.

text.p: IPE natural gas futures headed in mixed directions on Monday, after falling across the board on Friday.
A total of 145 lots changed hands, with 95 lots done on October, which slipped 0.05 penny a therm to settle at 10.870 pence. November was firmer, however, gaining 0.030 penny at end at 13.45 pence.
"There's no particular direction on the market today, just a few corrections to moves made on Friday," said one trader.
February next year gained 0.030 penny to trade at 18.55 pence, although March was talked 0.050 penny lower at the end of the day.
